message.content:
The Jaguar XF is available in various trims, including Standard, R-Sport, Portfolio, and S. The interior of the car also contains premium materials such as leather upholstery, wood or aluminum trim accents.

The Jaguar XF has an impressive cabin that boasts a comfortable and luxurious setting for passengers. It features a large infotainment screen and high-quality materials throughout the car's design. Some standard features include dual-zone climate control, keyless entry/start system, power-adjustable front seats with lumbar support adjustment on some trims.

A significant feature of higher trims like the R-Sport and Portfolio versions is the styling upgrades that provide sporty appearance cues like larger wheels/brakes/tires along with special badging/additional exterior paint options that distinguish them from their more conservative counterparts.

Some optional amenities include:
- Heated steering wheel
- Heated/cooled front seats
- Rear window sunshade
- Panoramic glass roof

In terms of performance updates on different models:
1) Base Engine: A 2-liter turbocharged inline-four engine comes standard across all models producing sufficient horsepower.
2) Available Engines: Higher-end variants offer several engine choices depending upon the market â€“ 
a) 3-Liter supercharged V6 (either gasoline or diesel)
b) 5-Liter Supercharged V8

Additionally, there are adaptive dynamics suspension options coupled with configurable driving modes to cater to your ride preference by adjusting throttle response / gear-shift points / electric steering assist / damper settings etc to optimize either comfort/sportiness/efficiency/etc based on driver inputs/preferences! 

Overall - There are many benefits/features/version-packs available for buyers in order to create/configure their ideal spec-version meeting personal tastes/wants
